label: Agent Allows Negotiation
definition: Privacy Term that indicates the Privacy Agent should allow negotiations

label: Agent Allows Negotiation Only Known Party
definition: Privacy Term that indicates the Privacy Agent should allow negotiations but only from known parties

label: Agent Allows Negotiation Only Prior Agreement Party
definition: Privacy Term that indicates the Privacy Agent should allow negotiations but only from known parties with whom an agreement was established in the past

label: Agent Allows Requests
definition: Privacy Term that indicates the Privacy Agent should allow requests to be made

label: Agent Allows Requests Only Known Party
definition: Privacy Term that indicates the Privacy Agent should allow requests to be made but only from prior known parties

label: Agent Allows Requests Only Prior Agreement Party
definition: Privacy Term that indicates the Privacy Agent should allow requests to be made but only from prior known parties with whom an agreement was established in the past

label: Agent Disallows Negotiation
definition: Privacy Term that indicates the Privacy Agent should not allow any negotiations

label: Agent Disallows Requests
definition: Privacy Term that indicates the Privacy Agent should not allow any requests to be made

label: Privacy Agent Negotiation Behaviour
definition: Privacy Term that indicates the behaviour of the Privacy Agent in relation to negotiations

label: Privacy Agent Request Behaviour
definition: Privacy Term that indicates the behaviour of the Privacy Agent in relation to requests

label: Authority
definition: A legal authority that is empowered to investigate and determine compliance

label: Conflict Resolution Term
definition: Privacy Term related to resolving conflicts in Privacy Term(s)

label: Data Sharing Allowed
definition: Privacy Term that indicates Data Sharing is allowed

label: Data Sharing Disallowed
definition: Privacy Term that indicates Data Sharing is not allowed

label: Data Sharing Term
definition: Privacy Term related to Data Sharing

label: Data Transparency Ex Ante
definition: Privacy Term that indicates transparency regarding data involved and its source is obligated ahead of intended process i.e. ex-ante transparency regarding data involved and its source

label: Data Transparency Ex Post
definition: Privacy Term that indicates transparency regarding data involved and its source is obligated after intended process i.e. ex-post transparency regarding data involved and its source

label: Data Transparency Not Required
definition: Privacy Term that indicates transparency regarding data involved and its source is not required to be provided

label: Data Transparency On Request
definition: Privacy Term that indicates transparency regarding data involved and its source is obligated upon request

label: Data Transparency Term
definition: Privacy Term that indicates transparency regarding data involved and its source as an obligation

label: Deontic Interpretation Term
definition: Privacy Term related to interpretation of the Privacy Term(s) using deontic logic

label: Fully Anonymised Data Sharing Allowed
definition: Privacy Term that indicates Data Sharing is allowed only if the data is fully anonymised

label: Fully Anonymised Data Sharing Disallowed
definition: Privacy Term that indicates Data Sharing is not allowed even if the data is fully anonymised

label: Non-Service Data
definition: Data other than what is collected, produced, or otherwise generated in the context of a Service

label: Personal Data Contribution
definition: Privacy Term that indicates access is proactively provided by the person

label: Personal Data Contribution for AI Training and Development
definition: Privacy Term that indicates access to data is being provided for the purposes of Training and Operating AI technologies

label: Personal Data Contribution for Public Good
definition: Privacy Term that indicates access to data is being provided for the purposes of Public Good

label: Personal Data Contribution for Intent Casting
definition: Privacy Term that indicates access to data is being provided for the purposes of Intent Casting

label: Party
definition: An entity that is part of a contractual interaction and has decision making abilities or has obligations and responsibilities

label: Party Agent
definition: An agent that represents a party and can act on behalf of it - such as for signing contracts or negotiating terms
scopenote: Agents can be human or non-human i.e. machine agents

label: Party Transparency Ex Ante
definition: Privacy Term that indicates transparency regarding identities and involvement of parties in specific roles is obligated ahead of intended process i.e. ex-ante transparency regarding identities and involvement of parties in specific roles

label: Party Transparency Ex Post
definition: Privacy Term that indicates transparency regarding identities and involvement of parties in specific roles is obligated after intended process i.e. ex-post transparency regarding identities and involvement of parties in specific roles

label: Party Transparency Not Required
definition: Privacy Term that indicates transparency regarding identities and involvement of parties in specific roles is not required to be provided

label: Party Transparency On Request
definition: Privacy Term that indicates transparency regarding identities and involvement of parties in specific roles is obligated upon request

label: Party Transparency Term
definition: Privacy Term that indicates transparency regarding identities and involvement of parties in specific roles as an obligation

label: Permissive Interpretation
definition: Privacy Term that indicates a permissive interpretation where if something is not prohibited or if there are no rules governing it, then it is assumed to be permitted

label: Person
definition: The human individual or person involved as the First Party in the contractual interaction

label: Person Agent
definition: A Privacy Agent that represents the Person or First Party

label: Portability Not Required
definition: Privacy Term that indicates data portability is not required to be provided

label: Portability Required Immediately
definition: Privacy Term that indicates data should be ported or made available immediately without delay

label: Portability Required On Request
definition: Privacy Term that indicates data should be ported or made available on request

label: Portability Term
definition: Privacy Term that indicates portability of data from service provider to individual

label: Portability To Third Party
definition: Privacy Term that indicates data should be ported or made available to third party

label: Preference Always Applies
definition: Privacy Term that indicates the privacy preference always applies in all contexts and should always be used in agreements and negotiations

label: Privacy Preference Applicability
definition: Privacy Term that indicates the applicability of Privacy Preference(s)

label: Preference Conditionally Applies
definition: Privacy Term that indicates the privacy preference conditionally applies i.e. it should only be used in agreements and negotiations if the associated condition is satisfied within the context

label: Preference Never Applies
definition: Privacy Term that indicates the privacy preference never applies in any context and should never be used in agreements or negotiations

label: Privacy Agent
definition: An agent that represents a party and can act on behalf of it to make decisions regarding privacy (and related matters)
scopenote: Privacy Agents can be human or non-human i.e. machine agents

label: Privacy Agent Behaviour
definition: Privacy Term that indicates the behaviour of the Privacy Agent

label: Privacy Endpoint
definition: An endpoint, such as a URL or an address, where privacy related communications can be made

label: Privacy Negotiation
definition: A negotiation between parties regarding choosing the appropriate privacy terms

label: Privacy Negotiation Clarification Required
definition: Status indicating the Privacy Negotiation requires a clarification from the other party regarding the relevant context

label: Privacy Negotiation Confirmation Required
definition: Status indicating the Privacy Negotiation requires a confirmation by a human before it can proceed

label: Privacy Negotiation Counter Offer Made
definition: Status indicating the terms involved in Privacy Negotiation were not accepted and a counter-offer has been made with a different set of terms

label: Privacy Negotiation Expired
definition: Status indicating the Privacy Negotiation has expired due to inactivity by a party or due to other reasons

label: Privacy Negotiation Initiated
definition: Status indicating the Privacy Negotiation process has been initiated

label: Privacy Negotiation Invalid
definition: Status indicating the Privacy Negotiation is deemed to be invalid and therefore cannot continue

label: Privacy Negotiation Paused
definition: Status indicating the Privacy Negotiation has been paused i.e. halted or put on hold without a specific decision

label: Privacy Negotiation Pending Response
definition: Status indicating the Privacy Negotiation process is underway and is awaiting a response from the other party

label: Privacy Negotiation Record
definition: A record of a privacy negotiation, including both accepted and rejected negotiations as well as the creation of contracts

label: Privacy Negotiation Refused
definition: Status indicating the Privacy Negotiation has been refused to be initiated or continued

label: Privacy Negotiation Request
definition: A request to initiate a privacy negotiation

label: Privacy Negotiation Requested
definition: Status indicating the Privacy Negotiation has been requested to be initiated

label: Privacy Negotiation Status
definition: Status associated with the Privacy Negotiation

label: Privacy Negotiation Terminated
definition: Status indicating the Privacy Negotiation has been terminated by one or more parties

label: Privacy Negotiation Unknown
definition: Status indicating the state of Privacy Negotiation is unknown

label: Privacy Preference
definition: A preference regarding privacy term(s) which indicates the terms are preferred over other terms, or are acceptable, or are unacceptable

label: Privacy Term
definition: A (contractual) term regarding privacy that expresses permissions, prohibitions, and obligations

label: Privacy Term Registry
definition: A registry of privacy terms

label: PrivacyTerms Accepted
definition: Status indicating the Privacy Negotiation is completed and the parties have accepted the relevant terms

label: PrivacyTerms Refused
definition: Status indicating the Privacy Negotiation is completed and the parties have refused the relevant terms

label: Profiling Allowed
definition: Privacy Term that indicates Profiling is allowed

label: Profiling Allowed No FP
definition: Privacy Term that indicates Profiling is allowed but only if it does not involve Fingerprinting

label: Profiling Allowed Only First Party
definition: Privacy Term that indicates Profiling is allowed but only by the 1st Party

label: Profiling Allowed Only Non PII
definition: Privacy Term that indicates Profiling is allowed but only if it uses non-PII

label: Profiling Disallowed
definition: Privacy Term that indicates Profiling is not allowed

label: Profiling Disallowed FP
definition: Privacy Term that indicates Profiling involving use of Fingerprinting is not allowed

label: Profiling Disallowed For Third Party
definition: Privacy Term that indicates Profiling is not allowed by 3rd Parties

label: Profiling Disallowed PII
definition: Privacy Term that indicates Profiling involving use of PII is not allowed

label: Profiling Term
definition: Privacy Term related to Profiling

label: Prohibitive Interpretation
definition: Privacy Term that indicates a prohibitive interpretation where if something is not permitted or if there are no rules governing it, then it is assumed to be prohibited

label: Provider Agent
definition: A Privacy Agent that repersents the Service Provider or Second Party

label: Purpose Transparency Ex Ante
definition: Privacy Term that indicates transparency regarding purposes involved for processing of data and technologies is obligated ahead of intended process i.e. ex-ante transparency regarding purposes involved for processing of data and technologies

label: Purpose Transparency Ex Post
definition: Privacy Term that indicates transparency regarding purposes involved for processing of data and technologies is obligated after intended process i.e. ex-post transparency regarding purposes involved for processing of data and technologies

label: Purpose Transparency Not Required
definition: Privacy Term that indicates transparency regarding purposes involved for processing of data and technologies is not required to be provided

label: Purpose Transparency On Request
definition: Privacy Term that indicates transparency regarding purposes involved for processing of data and technologies is obligated upon request

label: Purpose Transparency Term
definition: Privacy Term that indicates transparency regarding purposes involved for processing of data and technologies as an obligation

label: Resolve Across Contexts
definition: Privacy Term that indicates this conflict method should be used to resolve all conflicts across contexts i.e. other contexts that have their own conflict resolution method should be overridden

label: Resolve By Discarding
definition: Privacy Term that indicates a conflict should be resolved by discarding the conflicting terms i.e. removing all terms that are in conflict

label: Resolve Only Within Context
definition: Privacy Term that indicates a conflict should be resolved using the specified method but only for this context i.e. other contexts that have their own conflict resolution method should not be overridden

label: Resolve Preferring Permission
definition: Privacy Term that indicates a conflict should be resolved by preferring the permission over the prohibition i.e. if something is both prohibited and permitted, it is assumed to be permitted

label: Resolve Preferring Prohibition
definition: Privacy Term that indicates a conflict should be resolved by preferring the prohibition over the permission i.e. if something is both prohibited and permitted, it is assumed to be prohibited

label: Responsible Party
definition: The party that is responsible for a specific activity

label: SD-BY
definition: Privacy Term that only allows for Service Delivery

label: SD BY-A
definition: Privacy Term that only allows for Service Delivery and Analytics

label: SD BY-A-DP
definition: Privacy Term that only allows for Service Delivery and Analytics, with an obligation for Data Portability

label: SD BY-AT
definition: Privacy Term that only allows for Service Delivery, Analytics, and First-Party Tracking

label: SD BY-AT-DP
definition: Privacy Term that only allows for Service Delivery, Analytics, and First-Party Tracking, with an obligation for Data Portability

label: SD BY-ATP
definition: Privacy Term that only allows for Service Delivery, Analytics, and First-Party Tracking and Profiling

label: SD BY-ATP-DP
definition: Privacy Term that only allows for Service Delivery, Analytics, and First-Party Tracking and Profiling, with an obligation for Data Portability

label: SD BY-ATP-S3P
definition: Privacy Term that only allows for Service Delivery, Analytics, and First-Party Tracking and Profiling with fully anonymised data being allowed to be shared with Third Parties

label: SD BY-ATP-S3P-DP
definition: Privacy Term that only allows for Service Delivery, Analytics, and First-Party Tracking and Profiling with fully anonymised data being allowed to be shared with Third Parties, with an obligation for Data Portability

label: SD BY-DP
definition: Privacy Term that only allows for Service Delivery, with an obligation for Data Portability

label: Service Analytics
definition: Purposes associated with analysing the usage, delivery, and provisioning metrics of a service

label: Service Analytics Data
definition: Data collected, produced, or otherwise generated in the context of analysing the usage and provision of a Service

label: Service Data
definition: Data collected, produced, or otherwise generated in the context of a Service

label: Service Delivery
definition: Purposes associated with delivery of a service

label: Service Improvement
definition: Purposes associated with identifying and implementing improvements to a service

label: Service Provider
definition: The Service Provider involved as the Second Party in the contractual interaction

label: Service Usage Data
definition: Data collected, produced, or otherwise generated in the context of using a Service

label: Third Party
definition: A party other than First and Second Party in the contractual interaction

label: Tracking Allowed
definition: Privacy Term that indicates Tracking is allowed

label: Tracking Allowed No FP
definition: Privacy Term that indicates Tracking is allowed but only if it does not involve Fingerprinting

label: Tracking Allowed Only1P
definition: Privacy Term that indicates Tracking is allowed but only by the 1st Party

label: Tracking Allowed Only Non PII
definition: Privacy Term that indicates Tracking is allowed but only if it uses non-PII

label: Tracking Disallowed
definition: Privacy Term that indicates Tracking is not allowed

label: Tracking Disallowed3P
definition: Privacy Term that indicates Tracking is not allowed by 3rd Parties

label: Tracking Disallowed FP
definition: Privacy Term that indicates Tracking involving use of Fingerprinting is not allowed

label: Tracking Disallowed PII
definition: Privacy Term that indicates Tracking involving use of PII is not allowed

label: Tracking Term
definition: Privacy Term related to Tracking

label: Transparency Ex Ante
definition: Privacy Term that indicates transparency is obligated ahead of intended process i.e. ex-ante transparency

label: Transparency Ex Post
definition: Privacy Term that indicates transparency is obligated after intended process i.e. ex-post transparency

label: Transparency Not Required
definition: Privacy Term that indicates transparency is not required to be provided

label: Transparency On Request
definition: Privacy Term that indicates transparency is obligated upon request

label: Transparency Term
definition: Privacy Term that indicates transparency as an obligation

label: has Agent Behaviour
definition: Relation that indicates the behaviour of Privacy Agents

label: has authority
definition: Specifies the involved authority

label: has Conflict Resolution
definition: Relation that indicates the Conflict Resolution Term that should be used

label: has Data Sharing Term
definition: Relation that associates a Data Sharing Term

label: has Deontic Interpretation
definition: Relation that indicates the Deontic Interpretation Term that should be used

label: has human readable format
definition: Indicates the specified resource is a human readable format of the subject

label: has machine readable format
definition: Indicates the specified resource is a machine readable format of the subject
scopenote: To assist in interpreting the resource, we strongly suggest using dct:conformsTo with an appropriate URI to indicate the specific standard or specification used to express the resource

label: has party
definition: Specifies that an entity is a party to the context i.e. it has decision making abilities or has obligations and responsibilities

label: has party agent
definition: Specifies the agent that represents a party and can act on behalf of it - such as for signing contracts or negotiating terms
scopenote: Agents can be human or non-human i.e. machine agents

label: has person
definition: Specifies the human individual or person involved as the First Party

label: has Portability Term
definition: Relation that associates a Portability Term

label: has Preference Applicability
definition: Relation that indicates the applicability of Privacy Preference(s)

label: has privacy agent
definition: Specifies the agent that represents a party and can act on behalf of it to make decisions regarding privacy (and related matters)
scopenote: Privacy Agents can be human or non-human i.e. machine agents

label: has privacy endpoint
definition: Indicates the endpoint, such as a URL or an address, where privacy related communications can be made

label: has privacy negotiation
definition: Indicates the inclusion or applicability of the specified Privacy Negotiation

label: has privacy negotiation request
definition: Indicates the inclusion or applicability of the specified Privacy Negotiation Request

label: has privacy preference
definition: Indicates the inclusion or applicability of the specified Privacy Preference

label: has privacy term
definition: Indicates the inclusion or applicability of the specified Privacy Term

label: has privacy term registry
definition: Indicates the inclusion or applicability of the specified Privacy Term Registry

label: has Profiling Term
definition: Relation that associates a Profiling Term

label: has responsible party
definition: Specifies the party that is responsible for the activity

label: has service provider
definition: Specifies the Service Provider involved as the Second Party

label: has third party
definition: Specifies the party is involved as a Third Party

label: has Tracking Term
definition: Relation that associates a Tracking Term

label: has Transparency Term
definition: Relation that associates a Transparency Term
